name: beefree-sdk-examples
description: Collection of Beefree SDK example projects

scripts.start:autosave: yarn install --check-files && cd auto-save-template-versioning && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd auto-save-template-versioning && yarn server:dev" "cd auto-save-template-versioning && yarn client" --names "autosave-backend,autosave-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:commenting: yarn install --check-files && cd commenting-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd commenting-example && yarn server:dev" "cd commenting-example && yarn dev" --names "commenting-backend,commenting-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:conditional-rows: yarn install --check-files && cd conditional-rows-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd conditional-rows-example && yarn server:dev" "cd conditional-rows-example && yarn dev" --names "conditional-rows-backend,conditional-rows-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:custom-css: yarn install --check-files && cd custom-css-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd custom-css-example && yarn server:dev" "cd custom-css-example && yarn dev" --names "custom-css-backend,custom-css-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:template-pdf: yarn install --check-files && cd template-export-pdf-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd template-export-pdf-example && yarn server:dev" "cd template-export-pdf-example && yarn dev" --names "pdf-backend,pdf-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:multi-builder: yarn install --check-files && cd multi-builder-switch-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd multi-builder-switch-example && yarn server:dev" "cd multi-builder-switch-example && yarn dev" --names "multi-builder-backend,multi-builder-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.start:ai-agent: yarn install --check-files && cd ai-agent-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd ai-agent-example && yarn server:dev" "cd ai-agent-example && yarn dev" --names "ai-backend,ai-frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"

author: Beefree
